name: Pepperoni
summary: Tomato sauce, basil, mozzarella cheese and plenty of pepperoni.

name: 4 Formaggi
summary: An explosion of cheesy taste: mozzarella, fontina, gorgonzola and parmigiano on a white pizza.

name: Margherita
summary: Classic, simple and delicious pizza with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.

name: Focaccia
summary: The pizza before there was pizza. Simple, yet delightful.

name: Mushroom Feast
summary: Delicious combination of chantarelles and maitake over tomato sauce.

name: Seafood Supreme
summary: Fantastic mix of shrimps, anchovies, squid and clams on a white pizza.

name: Pomodorini
summary: Simple and tasty. Tomato sauce, mozzarella, parmigiano and organic Italian pomodirini.

name: White & Truffle
summary: Luxurious black truffle on a white pie, mozzarella and parmigiano.

name: 4 Stagioni
summary: Discover a different taste in every slice.
